trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理的方法<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The handler is not required to perform any action, and your code should avoid generating exceptions or allowing exceptions to propagate to the calling method.
trans-unit.target: 此處理常式不需要執行任何動作，並產生例外狀況，或讓例外狀況傳播至呼叫的方法，您的程式碼應該避免。

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions that do reach the caller are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 執行到呼叫端的任何例外狀況都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The handler may use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleRowUpdatingEventArgs> to influence the processing of the updates.
trans-unit.target: 此處理常式可能會使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleRowUpdatingEventArgs>影響的更新處理。</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleRowUpdatingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For example, the handler may opt to skip the update of the current row or skip the update of all remaining rows.
trans-unit.target: 例如，處理常式也可以選擇略過目前的資料列的更新，或略過所有其餘的資料列的更新。

trans-unit.source: Note that the rows are updated in the order that they were received from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，資料列也會更新資料來源接收它們的順序。

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleRowUpdatingEventArgs> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleRowUpdatingEventArgs>委派，必須識別處理事件的方法。</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleRowUpdatingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
